import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Form, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Message from '../components/Message' import { addToCart, removeFromCart } from '../actions/cartActions' const CartScreen = ({ match, location, history }) => {//history is for redirect //we have id and qty in URL const productId = match.params.id const qty = location.search ? Number(location.search.split('=')[1]) : 1 //location search is sth. after the "?qty=1" const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart)//grap state of cart const { cartItems } = cart useEffect(() => { if (productId) { dispatch(addToCart(productId, qty)) } }, [dispatch, productId, qty]) const removeFromCartHandler = (id) => { dispatch(removeFromCart(id)) } const checkoutHandler = () => { history.push('/login?redirect=shipping') } return (

Shopping Cart

{cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your cart is empty Go Back ) : ( {cartItems.map((item) => ( // each item is a ListGroup.item {item.name} ${item.price} dispatch(addToCart(item.product, Number(e.target.value)))}> {/* dispatch addToCart action */} {[...Array(item.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( ))} ))} )} {/* total card */}

Subtotal ({cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.qty, 0)}) items {/* reduce takes a accumulator and current item */}

$ {cartItems .reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.qty * item.price, 0) .toFixed(2)} ) } export default CartScreen
